name: Color.Inc
description:
Color inc. place us inside a paint factory to create a variaety of color combinations until the time runs out. The fastest you mix, the higher score you get. A simple concept focused on agility and memory. Enjoy!

What was the most challenging part of making your entry?

Working as a team to put as much of our original idea in the final game. 

What was the most fun part?
Bringing our assets to life and think in a concept simple enough we were actually able to focus on the fun parts.
